summary: When an aging martial arts master chooses two of her meeker students to be her successors, two older students steal her mystical cane and pursue their rivals.
cast: Eva Celia Latjuba|Nicholas Saputra|Reza Rahadian|Tara Basro|Christine Hakim|Aria Kusumah|Slamet Rahardjo|Whani Darmawan|Darius Sinathrya|Prisia Nasution|Landung Simatupang
title: Pendekar Tongkat Emas
